comments.body:
em-websocket does not bundle the license in the correct place, so we need to include it in the recipe. Thus, there is no need to unpack the gem.
```suggestion
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  script:
    - gem install --norc -l -V --ignore-dependencies {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
    - gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  skip: {{ win }}
